SENT.plain: Behçet's disease is a chronic recurrent inflammatory disorder that affects many organs
A 48-year-old man with known Behçet's disease was admitted to the emergency department with aggravating severe back pain and left lower quadrant pain
A contained rupture of infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) was discovered with a maximum diameter of 10 cm
The patient's severe back pain was due to erosion of the third lumbar vertebra
